title: Pricing Policy
content: Pricing for Cozy Cat Kitchen subscriptions is based on a weekly frequency and is inclusive of all taxes. Delivery charges are additional and vary based on the shipping provider and location.

title: Shipping Policy
content: We ship all products through our trusted shipping partners. Delivery time and charges are calculated based on the user's location.

title: Terms & Conditions
content: By subscribing to our services, you agree to our terms and conditions. Subscriptions are billed on a weekly basis.

title: Privacy Policy
content: We take your privacy seriously. All personal data is processed in compliance with relevant data protection regulations.

title: Cancellation/Refund Policy
content: Cancellations are only allowed before the order is accepted. Refunds are not applicable as this is a perishable product.
